nodes.text: Frond-grass was a species of grass that grew on the Outer Rim world of Mandalore. Known for its deep green coloration, frond-grass thrived in moist areas. In a Keldabe alleyway near the Kelita River, frond-grass grew plentifully in the cracks between the stones that were constantly wet from the spray of the fast-moving river.

Frond-grass was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the Republic Commando series novel, Imperial Commando: 501st, written by author Karen Traviss and published October 27, 2009. Frond-grass was later mentioned in the roleplaying game adventure book Friends Like These, published on December 8, 2016 by Fantasy Flight Games.
